Reviews.Title: Gift for my niece who loves it.
Reviews.Author: D. Potter
Reviews.Content: Does what it says it will do.  What more could I ask.  Good value. I don't have 6 more words.

Reviews.Title: works for kids
Reviews.Author: Mom of boys
Reviews.Content: I have not seen the printed pictures from this camera yet, but the memory is very small and the screen to show the picture is too. The camera is pretty slow in taking the shots too. That being said - the price is right for a 6 year old who thinks taking pictures is fun but has a bad habit of losing things. I would not give this to an adult - but would not hesitate again to buy it for a child.

Reviews.Title: Sub-par digital camera
Reviews.Author: JewishUsedBooks
Reviews.Content: The resolution is terrible. the screen display shows a grainy bad resolution picture. You can do alot better for your money.
